amendment.description: To allocate funds for certain terrorism prevention activities, including rail and transit security.

action.text: Amendment SA 1205 proposed by Senator Shelby.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1205.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1205 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 186.
Amendment SA 1205 ruled out of order by the chair.
